Question: What is Jenkis
Answer: Jenkins is an open-source automation server that helps automate the software development process. Jenkins is a popular server-based system used to automate the software development process. It helps to monitor the execution of repetitive jobs, such as building, testing, and deploying software applications. Jenkins can be used to set up continuous integration and continuous delivery and to build and test applications. It can also be used to monitor and report on the progress of software builds and deployments.
